title: Fun
text: Looks like I’m not having too much fun right now!

title: Harshith Mohan Kumar
text:
GitHub

     Email
  

  
  


I’m Harshith, welcome to my personal site!
I’m currently an aspiring ML/CV Engineer, passionately pursuing my Masters in Computer Science. My research interests encompass a diverse range of topics in the field of computer vision and deep learning.
With the privilege of interning at Intel, contributing to Google Summer of Code, and being a research fellow at the Indian Institute of Science, I bring a rich tapestry of experiences.
My journey has been punctuated by multiple acceptances at top conferences, showcasing my commitment to excellence. Feel free to explore my research publications here.






MSCS | Sept 2023 - Present




B.Tech CS | Aug 2019 - June 2023

title: Harshith Mohan Kumar

I’m Harshith, welcome to my personal site!
I’m currently an aspiring ML/CV Engineer, passionately pursuing my Masters in Computer Science. My research interests encompass a diverse range of topics in the field of computer vision and deep learning.
With the privilege of interning at Intel, contributing to Google Summer of Code, and being a research fellow at the Indian Institute of Science, I bring a rich tapestry of experiences.
My journey has been punctuated by multiple acceptances at top conferences, showcasing my commitment to excellence. Feel free to explore my research publications here.

title: Harshith Mohan Kumar
text:
Recent News

2023

[08/07/23] - Extended abstract accepted at ICCV’23 BRAVO Workshop!
[07/20/23] - OCTraN now on ArXiv.
[05/29/23] - OCTraN paper accepted at CVPR’23 T4V Workshop!
[01/02/23] - Working as ML Intern at Intel!



2022

[09/23/22] - Won Best Student Paper Award at ECML-PKDD’22 MLG workshop
